Header: Minister Bandula speaks of a conspiracy to destabilize the economy
Content: Minister of International Trade and Investment Promotion, Bandula Gunawardana charges that the UNP and the TNA are tarnishing the reputation of Sri Lanka by stating that the country is in a state of anarchy. Speaking at a press briefing in Colombo today, Minister Gunawardana further stated that their intention is to destabilize the economy.
